page.title: 18INDUSTRY IN BEDWORTH
page.content: Bedworth's industry is based on{ {ENGINEERING,}supplying the Coventry Motor Trade,Aircraft & Mining Industries.Most companies are small, employing up to 10 workers,& were established during the II World War. However the traditional{RIBBON WEAVING factory of Toye,Kenning & Spencer, where skilled work for the Armed Forces & Royal Household takes place, dates back to 1850.Bedworth's position adjacent to the M6 motorway & close to rail services makes it an ideal industrial situation.Warehousing & distribution have taken advantage of this.Many firms are using modern technology to improve efficiency.More industry lies on the{BAYTON ROAD {INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.}Products include plastics,hosiery & soft drinks.Here firms stated that access facilities were poor & traffic a problem.
